metadata.Title: CVE-2020-22524 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in FreeImage_Load function in FreeImageLibrary 3.19.0(r1828) allows attackers to cuase a denial of service viacrafted PFM file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-22524` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfreeimage3 - 3.18.0+ds2-1ubuntu3.1
libfreeimageplus3 - 3.18.0+ds2-1ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freeimage package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.18.0+ds2-1ubuntu3.1').
